metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Computer Science and Programming Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Get ready for computer science. Create graphical programs, learn computing mathematics, develop mental models of computer systems.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Computer Graphics (CG), Problem Solving, Mathematics, JavaScript, Computer Programming,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Dr Edward Anstead ,Dr Simon Katan ,Prof Marco Gillies ,Omar Karakchi ,Dr Matthew Yee-King ,
